sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Form, FormGroup, InputGroup, FormLabel, Button, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"

class App extends Component {
constructor(){
  super()
  this.state = {
    name: "",
    email: "",
    message: ""
  }
  this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this)
}

handleChange = e => {
  this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value })
}

  render() {
    return (
      <Form>
        <FormGroup>
          <FormLabel for="name">Name:</FormLabel>
          <InputGroup>
          <FormControl
            type="text"
            name="name"
            onChange={this.handleChange} />
            </InputGroup>
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup>
          <FormLabel for="email">Email:</FormLabel>
          <InputGroup>
          <FormControl
            type="email"
            name="email"
            onChange={this.handleChange} />
            </InputGroup>
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup>
          <FormLabel for="message">Message:</FormLabel>
          <InputGroup>
          <FormControl
            as="textarea"
            name="message"
            onChange={this.handleChange} />
            </InputGroup>
        </FormGroup>
        <Button>Submit</Button>
      </Form>

    );
  }
}

export default App;
